amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-395 to allow the Secretary of Agriculture or Secretary of the Interior, as appropriate, to exempt from wilderness designations under the Act any area determined by the Secretary to be at high risk of wildfire.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-395 to allow the Secretary of Agriculture or Secretary of the Interior, as appropriate, to exempt from wilderness designations under the Act any area determined by the Secretary to be at high risk of wildfire.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 64).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Westerman.
